body_html:
@lukaszkaiser @prb12 Thanks.
In my opinion, could I fix this bug by changing:
slot = variables.Variable(val, name=scope, trainable=False)
to
slot = variables.get_variable(val, name=scope, trainable=False)
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/slot_creator.py#L50
body_text:

body:
@lukaszkaiser @prb12 Thanks.
In my opinion, could I fix this bug by changing:
`slot = variables.Variable(val, name=scope, trainable=False)`
to
`slot = variables.get_variable(val, name=scope, trainable=False)`
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/slot_creator.py#L50
